articles.author: Oliver O'Connell
articles.title: Silicone breast implant deflected bullet away from woman's heart, doctors say - The Independent
articles.description: 'Deflection must have occurred' and only possible source was the implant
articles.content:
A Canadian woman who was shot in the chest has cheated death when the bullet was deflected away from her heart by one of her breast implants.
The unidentified victim took herself to a local emergency room after being struck by the bullet while walking down t… [+1897 chars]
